name: AbsenceOfCervix
title: Absence of cervix
description: This value set has not been tested in a clinical environment. Please use with caution.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Acquired absence of the cervix, agenesis of the cervix),(Data Element Scope: SNOMED CT disorder codes that represent an absence of the cervix),(Inclusion Criteria: Codes that represent acquired or congenital absence of the cervix. Codes that represent absence of other organs must also mention absence of the cervix to be included.),(Exclusion Criteria: Partial absence of the cervix, absence of the vagina or the uterus if the cervix is not included, other congenital abnormalities of the cervix, SNOMED CT "finding" or "situation" codes.)

concept.display: Acquired absence of cervix and uterus (disorder)

contains.display: Acquired absence of cervix and uterus (disorder)
